10. Capacity

§
§

Recommendation: The CDD staff requested the capacity of the rearranged waiting area and sales area
Response: The waiting vestibule has an actual occupancy of approx. 15 customers. The retail dispensing space has an actual
occupancy of approx. 13 customers and 6 employees. This brings the total first floor occupancy to approx. 34 +/- with a
maximum occupancy of 49. The facility will use the front door as its primary emergency exit.

11. Deliveries

Communication: 1686 Mass Ave_20200714 (Public Hearings)

§
§

§

Recommendation: Provide details on the retail dispensary in relation to deliveries. The planning board wanted to know whether
or not this facility would be making retail deliveries.

§

Response: As per section 11.800 of Cambridge’s City ordinance, “Retailers are prohibited from delivering cannabis or
marijuana products to consumers; and from offering cannabis or marijuana products for the purposes of onsite social
consumption on the premises of a Cannabis or Marijuana Establishment.” As a result, the applicant will not make any deliveries
of cannabis products to customers.

12. Contact with Abutters

Budega, Inc

§

Recommendation: The planning board recommended that the applicant communicate with its abutters who have raised
concerns to the project.

§

Response: Applicant met with Porter Square Neighborhood Association. Communicated with Direct Abutters: Temple Bar (1688
Mass Ave) and Invivia Studio (1684 Mass Ave)
